pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tropical Fisheries Analysis // A compilation of fish stock assessment methods for the analysis of length-frequency data in the context of data-poor fisheries. Includes methods and examples included in the FAO Manual by P. Sparre and S.C. Venema (1998), "Introduction to tropical fish stock assessment" (https://openknowledge.fao.org/server/api/core/bitstreams/bc7c3 7b6-30df-49c0-b5b4-8367a872c97e/content), as well as other more recent methods.
